alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 6:43AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Bay County through 730 AM EST/630 AM CST/... At 643 AM EST/543 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Panama City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, St Andrews State Park, Allanton, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, College Station, Bayou George, West Panama City, Bahama Beach, Biltmore Beach, Brannonville and Millville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EST/800 AM CST/ for the Panhandle of Florida.
